snippet.title: The Time I Have Left - Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
Guide Aline, a woman marked for death in the next six hours, in her escape from the depths of Colony 7 - a mysteriously deserted underground city.

Follow her time-driven escape adventure, explore and uncover the secrets of a desolate complex, and face grotesque visions of death in a turn-based combat system with an active twist. 

▼ Wishlist now on steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1918830/The_Time_I_Have_Left/

Stay tuned for updates through any of the following channels! 

▼ Twitter: https://twitter.com/ground_ga

▼ Join our Discord server: https://discord.com/invite/uZrUwwFJr7 

▼ Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/ground_ga/ 

▼ Website: https://www.groundga.com/

▼ Listen to the track on SoundCloud : https://soundcloud.com/ground_ga

Thanks to our friends @Flama Studio (https://www.instagram.com/flama_studio/) for helping out in the production of this trailer!
